title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: The creation of the initial DEX offering (IDO), one of the various unique fundraising approaches, has emerged from the growth of the cryptocurrency market.DEXs offer bitcoin investors a different, more equitable crowdfunding paradigm. An IDO is a way to raise funds from ordinary investors. The IDO was founded to overcome the flaws of the "" conventional"" ICO cryptocurrency crowdfunding approach. DEXs may be regarded as decentralised liquidity exchanges because an IDO works in conjunction with a DEX rather than a centralised exchange.So, without further ado, check out AdLunam, one of the greatest launchpads/IDO solutions available in 2022: https://adlunam.cc

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Launchpads are an incredible way for new crypto projects to gain notoriety and liquidity, utilizing the breadth and depth of the launchpad’s influence to get projects off the ground and into the hands of investors.There are many launchpads to choose from, hosting both big and small projects all with the potential to crack the crypto glass ceiling and make it to the moon. One platform in particular, however, have particular reason to be kept an eye right now, as their upcoming projects have a lot of potentials.That platform is AdLunam Launchpad.Learn more: adlunam.cc
